column1: Master of Arts/Master of Science (Analytics) (Self Financed) - Mumbai Campus
column5: Apply nowIn the milieu of convergent information and communication technologies (ICT) and growing application of artificial intelligence, analytics of big data and data science generate exciting career opportunities in the labour market. For long people have been doing the analytics; they have been designing, tabulating, presenting, drawing inferences, and predicting. Varian (2014), however, view why the analytics turns out to be an exciting opportunity.“Computers are now involved in many economic transactions and can capture data associated with these transactions, which can then be manipulated and analyzed. Conventional statistical and econometric techniques such as regression often work well but there are issues unique to big datasets that may require different tools”.
